cough.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: to suddenly push air out of your throat with a short sound, often repeatedly
cough.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: Matthew coughed and cleared his throat.
I think I’m getting a cold or flu – I’ve been coughing and sneezing all day.
cough.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: to make a sudden sound like someone coughing
cough.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: The engine coughed and spluttered, then stopped altogether.
cough.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a medical condition that makes you cough a lot
cough.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Symptoms include a sore throat and a nasty cough.
cough.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: the action or sound made when you cough
cough.translation[1].note_box[0].section: I’ve had a cough for weeks now.
A lot of people get coughs at this time of year.
Jason’s at home with a bad cough.
He has a slight cough but I don’t think he’s really ill.
You should take some cough medicine.
He was sucking on a cough sweet.
